eligibility:
History WMU began its partnership with Christ University in 1997 and has been successfully working with students from Christ for more than 20 years. Now, WMU is offering its MBA program for Christ University students. The program’s integrated approach, flexibility and opportunity to discover your path in business, make it particularly attractive.
Accommodations Students are responsible for finding their own housing. There are several apartment buildings conveniently located near Western Michigan University.
US Visa Obtaining a visa is the student’s responsibility. However, all documents required for transfer to WMU will be provided by CHRIST (Deemed to be University).
Note: Students must have GMAT and TOEFL Score by January 15, 2022 (Valid Passport is required).
Additional Information For additional information, visit https://wmich.edu/mba/ or contact Barb Tomczak, Associate Director of Student Support and Global Business Center at WMU’s Haworth College of Business.
